title: New: Chairlift – Sidewalk Safari
body: If you take the time to ignore Caroline Polachek, (the hottest thing to ever cone out of Brooklyn), you’ll realise that **[Chairlift](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/11004-video-chairlift-amanaemonesia/ "Video: Chairlift – Amanaemonesia")** are making some of the most exciting pop music around at the moment. Their first single to drop from their 2012 LP, **_Amanaemonesia_**, was a luscious and surrealist wonder. A hard track to follow, yet **_‘Sidewalk Safari’_** makes it look frighteningly easy. Full of 80’s goofball like synths, and that charming as fuck voice of Polachek’s makes this record just as exciting as it’s former. The album can’t come soon enough.
